title: Hansi Flick gives his verdict on Marcus Rashford Barcelona form ahead of Chelsea tie
body_text:
Barcelona manager Hansi Flick took the time to heap praise on Marcus Rashford as the Englishman returns to his home country for a big Champions League match against Chelsea.
Hansi Flick gives his verdict on Marcus Rashford’s Barcelona form ahead of Chelsea tie
The coach is very happy with the Englishman’s impact
Speaking at a press conference on Monday, Flick talked highly of Rashford’s impact as the winger is one of the team’s leaders in goal contributions this season and has been crucial during Raphinha’s absence due to injury, and credited a change in scenery and a new style of football as the main factors behind Rashford’s return to his best version.
”I’m very happy for Marcus. He’s back from a cold and he’s fine; I’ll decide tomorrow whether he starts or comes off the bench. But I’m happy to have him in the team, playing for Barça.
“I’ve followed him throughout his career and I’ve always been impressed by his quality and what he’s capable of in the box, and he’s showing that in Barcelona. This change for him, in a new style of football, in Barcelona, with the great weather… For me, it’s incredible to see how he’s always smiling. It’s the atmosphere we have here, and it’s very good for him.”
Raphinha’s return means Rashford will likely see a slightly diminished role once the Brazilian comes back to full fitness, but Rashford will no doubt still have a big part to play as a Super Sub throughout the season.
